Summary: A red fire ball directly south.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There was one other sighting in Omaha on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI first saw the object when my family and I were coming home from a firework show that the eagle run golf course puts on every year. When I was looking threw the smoke from the fire works I look in the sky and saw the UFO in the sky at first I thought it was ether a planet or are a firework but then I stopped stop to get a better look at it and I realized that it was slowly moving. As one of the guest got ready to go when I noticed the sphere vanished in to thin air.
